title: LF a ranked team
body:
I'm mainly a top/mid laner but I can move around if I need too.

What I'm looking for are laid back players who don't rage and are trolls.

replies.body:
I mean eople who don't flip out over the smallest things and then feed or afk I'm looking for players who can play seriously but don't overreact.

If that makes sense.
So you are after a group of players who just mess around for fun and call it a team?
